mapper.select: select ba.id, ba.publisher, DATE_FORMAT(ba.createTime, '%b,%d %Y') as createTime, ba.articleTitle, ba.articleIntroduction, (select count(*) from blog_article_like_list as ball where ball.articleId = ba.id) as articleLikes, ba.articleViews, ba.articlePicture, (select count(*) from blog_article_comment as bac where bac.articleId = ba.id) as commentTotal from blog_article as ba order by ba.id desc
select count(*) from blog_article where id = #{articleId}
mapper.update: update blog_article as ba set ba.articleViews = ba.articleViews + 1 where ba.id = #{articleId}
